name: Canadian Renters
tag_list: rent, apartments, property-rentals, property-management, home-rentals, townhome, condo, landlord
overview:
Canadian Renters offers Canada-wide apartment rental services.

The newly launched Canadian Renters website lets you quickly search for an apartment, house, condo or practically any other residential property in Canada. The site offers coverage for approximately 3500 rental locations across the country making it one of the most comprehensive rental sites in Canada.

Listing Standard property advertisements on the site is completely free. Property managers and landlords wishing to be more competitive can purchase premium rental listings. These paid ads will provide greater exposure, provide some additional features and allow managers to extend the terms of the advertisements by a greater interval.

Integrated maps and more traditional city/province searches make finding a property on the site quick and easy. In addition, there are a number of advanced tools aimed at property managers to help manage large numbers of ads and to help simplify property managerâ€™s day-to-day renting activities.
